languages.text: {n}Несмотря на молниеносную скорость, с которой слуга подал вам чашку, он умудрился не расплескать ни капли. Вкус напитка вполне соответствует натуре нового хозяина дворца — брутально крепкий и жгущий огнем драгоценных специй.{/n}

{n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaf strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на молниеносную скорость, с которой слуга подал вам чашку, он умудрился не расплескать ни капли. Вкус напитка вполне соответствует натуре нового хозяина дворца — брутально крепкий и жгущий огнем драгоценных специй.{/n}

{n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaff strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}

{n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaff strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}

{n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaf strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管弗罗舍以迅雷不及掩耳的速度为你倒好了咖啡，但咖啡却一滴都没有洒出来。你感觉口中雷卡咖啡的味道，与这座宫殿的新主人非常相配——浓烈、灼热，还带着珍贵香料的芬芳。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaf strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管弗罗舍以迅雷不及掩耳的速度为你倒好了咖啡，但咖啡却一滴都没有洒出来。你感觉口中雷卡咖啡的味道，与这座宫殿的新主人非常相配——浓烈、灼热，还带着珍贵香料的芬芳。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A pesar de la velocidad con la que Froscher te ha servido, no se le ha caído ni una gota. El sabor de este café te recuerda al nuevo dirigente del palacio: brutalmente intenso y ardiente, con un toque punzante de especias aromáticas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaf strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de la velocidad con la que Froscher te ha servido, no se le ha caído ni una gota. El sabor de este café te recuerda al nuevo dirigente del palacio: brutalmente intenso y ardiente, con un toque punzante de especias aromáticas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}フロッシャーは電光石火の速さで飲み物を出したにもかかわらず、1滴もこぼれていなかった。模造コーヒーの味わいが、この宮殿の新たな主と完璧に同調してあなたを揺さぶる。香り高い貴重な香辛料の鋭い一撃が、容赦ない強さと刺激をもたらしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaf strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}フロッシャーは電光石火の速さで飲み物を出したにもかかわらず、1滴もこぼれていなかった。模造コーヒーの味わいが、この宮殿の新たな主と完璧に同調してあなたを揺さぶる。香り高い貴重な香辛料の鋭い一撃が、容赦ない強さと刺激をもたらしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgré la vitesse à laquelle Froscher vous a {mf|servi|servie}, il a réussi à ne pas renverser une seule goutte. Le goût du recaff est à l'image du nouveau maître du palais : brutalement puissant et brûlant, avec une pointe d'épices précieuses pour l'arôme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaf strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré la vitesse à laquelle Froscher vous a {mf|servi|servie}, il a réussi à ne pas renverser une seule goutte. Le goût du recaff est à l'image du nouveau maître du palais : brutalement puissant et brûlant, avec une pointe d'épices précieuses pour l'arôme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Trotz der blitzartigen Geschwindigkeit, mit der Froscher dein Getränk serviert hat, hat er keinen Tropfen verschüttet. Der Geschmack des Rekaf passt perfekt zum neuen Herren des Palasts – extrem stark und durch wertvolle aromatische Gewürze zudem beißend scharf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaf strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz der blitzartigen Geschwindigkeit, mit der Froscher dein Getränk serviert hat, hat er keinen Tropfen verschüttet. Der Geschmack des Rekaf passt perfekt zum neuen Herren des Palasts – extrem stark und durch wertvolle aromatische Gewürze zudem beißend scharf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Meşrubatını yıldırım hızında tazelemesine rağmen Froscher, bir damla bile dökmemeyi başarmış. Kahfenin tadı, sarayın yeni efendisine yaraşır şekilde hayli kuvvetli. Kıymetli baharatların keskin aromaları, damağını yakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the lightning speed at which Froscher served your drink, he managed not to spill a drop. The taste of the recaf strikes you as a perfect match for the palace's new master — brutally strong and burning with a sharp hit of precious aromatic spices.{/n}
